description:
Yuda are a ferocious and poisonous type of sea serpents. They live in the Calm Belt and are so dangerous that they are one of the few creatures, that Sea Kings won`t attack, but apparently the Kuja people were able to domesticate them.
Boa Hancock and her two sisters own a ship which is drawn by these creatures, a newly added method of navigating through the Calm Belt.
name: Yuda
